    • GalleryDivs

      public void GalleryDivs() throws GalleryException
      Initialize the GalleryDivs method. Fetch galleries and display them in a grid.
      Throws:
      GalleryException - If there is an issue fetching galleries.

    • ArtistDivs

      public void ArtistDivs() throws GalleryException
      Initialize the ArtistDivs method. Fetch artists and display them in a grid.
      Throws:
      GalleryException - If there is an issue fetching artists.

    • ShowPaintings

      public void ShowPaintings(Integer id, String forWhat) throws GalleryException
      Initialize the ShowPaintings method. Show paintings based on the selected gallery or artist.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the gallery or artist.
      forWhat - Indicates whether the paintings are for a gallery, artist, or private gallery.
      Throws:
      GalleryException - If there is an issue fetching paintings.

    • ShowPaintingDetails

      public void ShowPaintingDetails(Painting painting) throws GalleryException
      Initialize the ShowPaintingDetails method. Show details of a selected painting.
      Parameters:
      painting - The painting to display details for.
      Throws:
      GalleryException - If there is an issue displaying painting details.

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws GalleryException
      Initialize the controller. Set initial content and event handlers.
      Throws:
      GalleryException - If there is an issue initializing the controller.

      Set the current user.

      Set the primary stage.

    • getMyGallery

      public List<Painting> getMyGallery()
      Get the user's private gallery.
